project.description: Job triggered by jenkins job: "emsPublishAMI" or manual. This job creating new ovoc azure image and generating SAS URL (URL to download the vhd file) 1. get OVOC Tag as parameter 2. download ovoc_azure_image_update.py file from artifactory 3. creating new VM from the OVOC-Template base image (500GB) 4.run "ovoc_azure_image_update.py" on the new VM (running update-hosts-file and adding dns suffix to /etc/resolv.conf) 5.run sanityInstall on the new VM 6.run "ovoc_azure_image_update.py" again to delete all important information from the VM 7. Generate SAS URL 8. delete the VM 10. send an email with the SAS URL
